verses.verse: Ye shall make <S%H6213><s%> you no idols <S%H457><s%>, neither shall ye rear you up <S%H6965><s%> a graven image <S%H6459><s%>, or a pillar <S%H4676><s%>, neither shall ye place <S%H5414><s%> any figured <S%H4906><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%>, to bow down <S%H7812><s%> unto it <S%H3068><s%>: for I am Jehovah your God <S%H430><s%>.
Ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
If ye walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and do them <S%H6213><s%>;

then I will give <S%H5414><s%> your rains <S%H1653><s%> in their season <S%H6256><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> its increase <S%H2981><s%>, and the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruit <S%H6529><s%>.

And your threshing <S%H1786><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> unto the vintage <S%H1210><s%>, and the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> unto the sowing time <S%H2233><s%>; and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full <S%H7648><s%>, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>, and ye shall lie down <S%H7901><s%>, and none shall make you afraid <S%H2729><s%>: and I will cause evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, neither shall the sword <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through your land <S%H776><s%>.
And ye shall chase <S%H7291><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>, and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And five <S%H2568><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and a hundred <S%H3967><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> ten thousand <S%H7233><s%>; and your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword <S%H2719><s%>.
And I will have respect <S%H6437><s%> unto you <S%H6509><s%>, and make you fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you <S%H6965><s%>, and will establish my covenant with you <S%H1285><s%>.
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> old store <S%H3462><s%> long kept <S%H3318><s%>, and ye shall bring forth the old <S%H3465><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the new <S%H2319><s%>.
And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H5315><s%>: and my soul shall not abhor you <S%H1602><s%>.
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H1961><s%>, and will be your God <S%H430><s%>, and ye shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%>.

I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, who brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that ye should not be their bondmen <S%H5650><s%>; and I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bars of your yoke <S%H5923><s%>, and made you go <S%H3212><s%> upright <S%H6968><s%>.
But if ye will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H6213><s%>, and will not do all these commandments <S%H4687><s%>;

and if ye shall reject <S%H3988><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and if your soul <S%H5315><s%> abhor <S%H1602><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, so that ye will not do <S%H6213><s%> all my commandments <S%H4687><s%>, but break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>;

I also will do <S%H6213><s%> this unto you <S%H6485><s%>: I will appoint terror <S%H928><s%> over you <S%H7829><s%>, even consumption and fever <S%H6920><s%>, that shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and make the soul <S%H5315><s%> to pine <S%H1727><s%> away <S%H2232><s%>; and ye shall sow your seed <S%H2233><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>, for your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat it <S%H398><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against you <S%H5062><s%>, and ye shall be smitten before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>: they that hate <S%H8130><s%> you shall rule <S%H7287><s%> over you <S%H5127><s%>; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you <S%H7291><s%>.
And if ye will not yet <S%H5704><s%> for these things hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H3256><s%>, then I will chastise you seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will break <S%H7665><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of your power <S%H5797><s%>: and I will make <S%H5414><s%> your heaven <S%H8064><s%> as iron <S%H1270><s%>, and your earth <S%H776><s%> as brass <S%H5154><s%>;

and your strength <S%H3581><s%> shall be spent <S%H8552><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>; for your land <S%H776><s%> shall not yield <S%H5414><s%> its increase <S%H2981><s%>, neither shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruit <S%H6529><s%>.

And if ye walk <S%H3212><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto me <S%H14><s%>, and will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H3254><s%>, I will bring seven times <S%H7651><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%> upon you according to your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> among you <S%H7921><s%>, which shall rob you of your children, and destroy <S%H3772><s%> your cattle <S%H929><s%>, and make you few in number <S%H4591><s%>; and your ways <S%H1870><s%> shall become desolate <S%H8074><s%>.
And if by these things ye will not be reformed <S%H3256><s%> unto me <S%H1980><s%>, but will walk contrary unto me <S%H7147><s%>;
then will I also walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto you <S%H5221><s%>; and I will smite you <S%H1571><s%>, even I <S%H7651><s%>, seven times for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon you <S%H5359><s%>, that shall execute the vengeance <S%H5358><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>; and ye shall be gathered together <S%H622><s%> within <S%H413><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%>: and I will send <S%H7971><s%> the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>; and ye shall be delivered into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>.

When I break <S%H7665><s%> your staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, ten <S%H6235><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall bake <S%H644><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%>, and they shall deliver <S%H7725><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> by weight <S%H4948><s%>: and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%>, and not be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>.
And if ye will not for all this <S%H2063><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H1980><s%>, but walk contrary unto me <S%H7147><s%>;
then I will walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto you in wrath <S%H2534><s%>; and I also <S%H637><s%> will chastise <S%H3256><s%> you seven times <S%H7651><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%>.
And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%>.

And I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> your high places <S%H1116><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> your sun-images <S%H2553><s%>, and cast <S%H5414><s%> your dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> upon the bodies <S%H6297><s%> of your idols <S%H1544><s%>; and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall abhor you <S%H1602><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%> a waste <S%H2723><s%>, and will bring <S%H8074><s%> your sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%> unto desolation <S%H8074><s%>, and I will not smell <S%H7306><s%> the savor <S%H7381><s%> of your sweet odors <S%H5207><s%>.
And I will bring <S%H8074><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into desolation <S%H8074><s%>; and your enemies <S%H341><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein shall be astonished at it <S%H8074><s%>.

And you will I scatter <S%H2219><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H776><s%>: and your land shall be a desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and your cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be a waste <S%H2723><s%>.

Then shall the land <S%H776><s%> enjoy <S%H7521><s%> its sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, as long <S%H3117><s%> as it lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%>, and ye are in your enemies <S%H341><s%>' land <S%H776><s%>; even then shall the land <S%H776><s%> rest <S%H7673><s%>, and enjoy <S%H7521><s%> its sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

As long as <S%H3117><s%> it lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> it shall have rest <S%H7673><s%>, even the rest <S%H7673><s%> which it had not in your sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, when ye dwelt upon it <S%H3427><s%>.

And as for them that are left <S%H7604><s%> of you <S%H935><s%>, I will send a faintness <S%H4816><s%> into their heart <S%H3824><s%> in the lands <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>: and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a driven <S%H5086><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall chase <S%H7291><s%> them <S%H5127><s%>; and they shall flee, as one fleeth <S%H4499><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> when none pursueth <S%H7291><s%>.

And they shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> one <S%H376><s%> upon another <S%H251><s%>, as it were before <S%H6440><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, when none pursueth <S%H7291><s%>: and ye shall have no power to stand <S%H8617><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>.
And ye shall perish <S%H6><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat you up <S%H398><s%>.

And they that are left <S%H7604><s%> of you shall pine away <S%H4743><s%> in their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in your enemies <S%H341><s%>' lands <S%H776><s%>; and also in the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall they pine away with them <S%H4743><s%>.

And they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, in their trespass <S%H4604><s%> which they trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me <S%H1980><s%>, and also that, because they walked contrary unto me <S%H7147><s%>,

I also walked <S%H3212><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, and brought them into the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>: if then <S%H176><s%> their uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> be humbled <S%H3665><s%>, and they then accept <S%H7521><s%> of the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>;

then will I remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; and also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and also my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%> will I remember <S%H2142><s%>; and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

The land <S%H776><s%> also shall be left <S%H5800><s%> by them <S%H7521><s%>, and shall enjoy its sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, while it lieth desolate <S%H8074><s%> without them <S%H7521><s%>: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; because <S%H3282><s%>, even because <S%H3282><s%> they rejected <S%H3988><s%> mine ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorred <S%H1602><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%>.

And yet <S%H637><s%> for all that <S%H2063><s%>, when they are <S%H1571><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%>, I will not reject <S%H3988><s%> them <S%H1602><s%>, neither will I abhor them <S%H3615><s%>, to destroy them utterly, and to break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H3068><s%>; for I am Jehovah their God <S%H430><s%>;

but I will for their sakes remember <S%H2142><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of their ancestors <S%H7223><s%>, whom I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, that I might be their God <S%H430><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

These are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and laws <S%H8451><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> between him and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
